title: Extend CreateTabRequest with git diff params
description:
Update the CreateTabRequest struct and handler to accept git diff parameters.

## Changes to handlers.go
```go
type CreateTabRequest struct {
    // existing fields...
    Path     string `json:"path,omitempty"`     // File path for git diff
    DiffMode string `json:"diffMode,omitempty"` // unstaged, staged, head, commit:<sha>, range:<from>..<to>
}
```

## Handler Logic
When type=diff and path is provided:
1. Validate path exists and is in a git repo
2. Parse diffMode (default to "unstaged")
3. Execute git diff
4. Use output as tab content
5. Set appropriate title if not provided

## Validation
- path must be absolute or resolvable
- diffMode must be valid format
- Return error if git command fails

title: Git-Based Diff Display
description:
Enable agentviewer to compute and display diffs directly from git, rather than requiring the caller to compute and pass diff content.

## Motivation
Currently, agents must compute diffs externally and pass the full diff content. With git-based diffs:
- Simpler API for agents - just pass a file path
- Agentviewer handles git diff computation internally
- Support for different diff modes (unstaged, staged, commits, branches)
- Less data to transfer (path vs full diff content)

## API Design
New parameters for diff tabs:
- `path`: File path to diff (required for git-based diffs)
- `diffMode`: How to compute the diff:
  - `"unstaged"` - Working directory vs index (default)
  - `"staged"` - Index vs HEAD
  - `"head"` - Working directory vs HEAD
  - `"commit:<sha>"` - Changes introduced by a specific commit
  - `"range:<from>..<to>"` - Diff between two refs

## Example Usage
```bash
# Show unstaged changes
curl -X POST /api/tabs -d '{
  "type": "diff",
  "path": "/path/to/file.go",
  "diffMode": "unstaged"
}'

# Show staged changes
curl -X POST /api/tabs -d '{
  "type": "diff", 
  "path": "/path/to/file.py",
  "diffMode": "staged"
}'
```

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] API accepts path + diffMode for diff tabs
- [ ] Runs git diff internally and displays result
- [ ] Proper error handling for non-git repos and invalid paths
- [ ] Works with existing diff rendering (diff2html)
- [ ] CLI help updated with git diff examples

title: Add git diff CLI examples to help
description:
Update the CLI help output to include examples of git-based diff creation.

## Add to EXAMPLES section
```
# Show unstaged changes to a file
curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/api/tabs \
  -d '{"type":"diff","path":"/path/to/file.go","diffMode":"unstaged"}'

# Show staged changes
curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/api/tabs \
  -d '{"type":"diff","path":"/path/to/file.py","diffMode":"staged"}'

# Show changes from HEAD
curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/api/tabs \
  -d '{"type":"diff","path":"/path/to/main.go","diffMode":"head"}'
```

## Update API documentation in help
Document the new parameters:
- path: File path for git-based diffs
- diffMode: unstaged (default), staged, head, commit:<sha>, range:<from>..<to>
